item.description:
PARTY TIME--in a new location! ***NOTE: I e-mailed the address and phone number to everyone who RSVP'd yes on Monday 12/3 -- if you didn't get the message with the details, contact me to let me know, as the address *will not* be posted on the public Web site. Thanks!*****

The function rooms at the restaurant where we'd tentatively planned to gather are now booked for a big company holiday party that day. After looking at some other options, I asked Pam whether we could take her up on her offer to host us at her place. She graciously agreed.

So we will be meeting at Pam's *cat-free* home in Natick rather than in Braintree.

For those who've been to Meetups at the Michaels store in Natick: Pam's place is about 1.5 miles from there. For those who haven't: It's a short distance from the Mass Pike (exit 13), Route 30 or Route 9. I'll send the address in a separate e-mail rather than posting it on the public Web site.


We'll show what we've been working on, swap some cards and talk about some fun stuff for 2008. We'll also do a small goodie-bag exchange--see the message boards for updates about participating in this. Should be lots of fun.


Pam will provide coffee and snacks. I'll provide beverages and more snacks. If we want to order out for lunch, we have many, many options right nearby; we can decide early on what we want to do.

Stay tuned for more details; just wanted to let you know about the location change!

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: December Meetup: Holiday Party--new location in Natick!
